job_tasks.phrase: Translate business requirements and engineering plans into detailed technical specifications.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding business needs and translating them into technical plans.

job_tasks.phrase: Manage extensive stakeholder relationships with clients, ensuring clear communication and alignment on project goals.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding client needs and aligning project goals, which is a core aspect of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct thorough technical reviews to ensure alignment with established engineering and architectural guidelines.
job_tasks.justification: Technical reviews are part of the software development lifecycle to ensure quality and adherence to standards.

job_tasks.phrase: Oversee the integration of various system components to ensure seamless functionality.
job_tasks.justification: Integration of system components is a key software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Play a key role in leading technical teams to successfully execute architectural plans.
job_tasks.justification: Leading teams in executing architectural plans falls under software development management and execution.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the quality and security of architectural implementations, ensuring adherence to best practices.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring quality, security, and best practices in architectural implementation is part of robust software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide expert input and technical insights for requests
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical input and insights is integral to the software development process, especially in a lead role.

soft_skills.phrase: Manage extensive stakeholder relationships with clients, ensuring clear communication and alignment on project goals.
Mentor and guide junior team members, fostering their growth and development.
Provide expert input and technical insights for requests
Play a key role in leading technical teams to successfully execute architectural plans.

classification.rationale: The job description lacks any mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. It focuses on general software development, technical leadership, and business alignment, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.
